Description:
Detects a suspicious IIS module registration as described in Microsoft threat report on IIS backdoors

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Microsoft (idea)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious IIS Module Registration
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (parent_process_path like '%\w3wp.exe' and ((command like '% system.enterpriseservices.internal.publish%' and process_path like '%\powershell.exe') or (command like '%gacutil%' and command like '% /i%') or command like '%appcmd.exe add module%'))
